s.text: "Actually, it's the other way around: it is making choices--right ones--that builds a strong personality."
Similarly, it has struck me that my other child might benefit from more writing of paragraphs and less discussion of "rubrics" and "hamburger model graphic organizers" in her writing periods.
So can the progressive virtues of critical thinking, independence, creativity, and community solidarity when served up as the only enlightened approach, or as self-esteem-building therapy.
